text: so you know a big choice was color really i mean silver or gold well i guess black was a choice too um we went with gold i know gold might be in and out but i like kind of the gold accents now it matches in in the rest of the room um you know we didn't do a hard wire just because you'd have to pay to install it and there's a there's an outlet down low but you know no need to change that uh it'd be nice it'd be cool be more finished but i also like the idea of we could change it out right so if we want to put a silver one up we can just go get a silver one and if we want to put a black one up we can get a black one and that way it's not a huge investment but you can still stay with you know your look that you want stay with the times right um and and pick the colors you need uh you know charging is you know it's it's it's it's it's it's it's it's it's it's it's it's it's it's it's it's it's it's not so hot but it still looks good even if it's not on so you know kind of turn it on when we know we're going to be in the area for a while and or if there are people coming over um and you know it's priced really well so you know kind of made it a no-brainer uh you know give it a shot and if you don't like it then you know you're not out a lot of money
